body:
From my meager Japanese reading abilities I understand that: 1. He originally had a human face but become a T head for some reason.
2. They tried to cure that with sex but failed.
3. " with the life that you saved (for as long as it continues) I would look at what your figure will become and support you for life (is my life reason) " = a romantic (?) way of saying I am here to stay but not as baggage.
